lead_paragraph: Two years ago, the Thunder's Kevin Durant tweeted that Kawhi Leonard was a good player who got a lot of help from the San Antonio Spurs' system.

headline.print_headline: Durant-Leonard Matchup Highlights Thunder vs. Spurs
headline.main: Durant-Leonard Matchup Highlights Thunder vs. Spurs
